oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Turn to the Right" program
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lyric Theater; theaters; programs;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A program for the New Lyric Theatre production of "Turn to the Right." Part of the 1919-1920 season, the show ran from April 22-24. An advertisement for the Dixie Motor Sales Company is on the back.
